jobs.description:
Responsible for the implementation and integration of Blue Prism, a productivity and automation tool, within the client environment. Responsible for successful execution of the projects from presales to delivery. 

• Identify scope of automation through feasibility study.
• Provided RPA and cognitive solutions to businesses for automating process to drive maximum benefit.
• Technical hands on with blue prism and automation anywhere.
• Devising new automated systems by methodically and systematically analysing existing processes and recognizing how Blue Prism can be used to improve them.
• Experience in daily review meetings to discuss customer feedback and troubleshoot key issues.
• Managed and tracked RPA implementations
• Driving projects for Citrix based applications using Surface Automation technique
• Experience in developing and end to end deployment of BOTS.

Here I worked with Australia client on .NET and VB/VBA projects for task Automation. My responsibilities here include coordinating with the client to understand requirements, perform analysis and provide advice on preparing low level design of the application.

I was also responsible for designing the tool, writing the codes and finally testing the application while adhering to the quality norms as well as developing new windows based applications in Microsoft technology. Mentoring junior team members, performing code reviews and supporting testing team are also part of my responsibilities.

Here I was involved in projects to develop Windows/Web Applications for Automation. I coordinated with the client to understand requirements, perform analysis and develop specifications. Developed and tested the work adhering to the time and budget.

I was also responsible for publishing and deploying the project on web server and writing the release notes. I was extensively involved in designing the database for new requirements and monitoring the jobs managing the database related issues.

Roles and Responsibilities : 
• Designing Business logic, presentation layer and database structure for Web and Window based applications .
• Reporting, Preparing User manual and test metrics.
• Implemented most of the functional modules applying .NET 4.0 framework, VB.NET, SSRS, SSIS, Web services,Automation Anywhere,OpenSpan,AutoHotKey VBA,Object oriented programming. ADO.NET and SQL SERVER 2012.

Here I Joined as Software Developer in the area of Windows based Applications/ Software and Web based Applications which works as a value add for the deal/client resulting in dollar savings.
My responsibilities here includes
o	Capture functional requirements and prepare proposal form along with technical design for approval.
o	Design and develop custom software solutions based on client’s requirements.
o	Designing, Coding, Testing and Managing Code throughout the software development lifecycle.
o	Developing solutions using technologies such as; VB.NET, VBA,VB Scripting, ASP.NET ,Automation, JavaScript, AutoHotKey,SQL SERVER 2008, ADO.NET, Web Services.
o	Adhere to companies project methodology for executing all automation projects
o	Writing and maintaining program code to meet system requirements, system designs and technical specifications in accordance with quality accredited standards.
o	Writing, updating and maintaining technical program, end user documentation and operational procedures
o	Testing, Debugging and Correcting bugs in Visual Studio 2010 and SQL Server as pointed by Users.
o	Identify the tools required for software deployment and implementation. Ensure availability of tools for successful software deployment. 
o	Preparing and maintaining the documentation on the objects developed/delivered by the team.

It has a trolley having a barcode reader which reads the bar code of product and update the same on your android phone. It helped in reducing the time delays in billing and people also don't have to stand in queue.It is made by using Arduino.2. "Smart Fan" : To monitor the speed of ceiling fan, we can increase/decrease its speed  from remote. It is made by using TV remote.3. "Smart Toilets" : To maintain the hygiene of college toilets, we have implements this project. In this project, we have monitored exhaust fan, flush and tube lights. It is made using AVR board and relays to control the time of operations.

jobs.description:
I create BOTS,
I Work With BOTS.
Robotics Process Automation Development.
The software robot operates on the user interface (UI) in the same way that a human would

Successfully managing the end to end lifecycle of various Robotics Process Automation projects by deploying an approved robotics automation tool in daily operations thereby achieving business goals such as improving efficiency, accuracy, standardized approach, reducing risk etc.

Primary responsibilities:
1. Be an interface with client, developers and other stakeholders
2. Articulating the understanding using process flow diagrams, definition documents, User manuals etc accurately and comprehensively 
3. Conducting discussions with stakeholders, apprising them of the progress - highlighting dependencies, risks, timelines etc., getting sign offs on functional documents
4.  Proposing business solutions to achieve desired benefits
5. Preparing and presenting business case to stakeholders
6. Understanding and contextualizing business requirements (Primary expertise in Investment Banking – Brokerage – Cash Equities/ Fixed Income, Securities Settlements)
